Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package controller

Class TurnController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.StateMachineController
      • controller.TurnController
  • public class TurnController
extends StateMachineController
    This class represents the Controller of the Turn. It handles all the possible interactions between the view and the Model

      void endPhase​(RemoteView caller)
      This method is called whenever the player has an additional optional action and decides not to carry it out

      This method is called whenever a method of the controller is called, but that method is not compatible with the current State

    • Method Detail

      • firstMove

        public void firstMove​(RemoteView caller,
                      int builderID,
                      Coordinate coordinate,
                      boolean specialPower)
        This method is called whenever, at the start of the turn, the player chooses the first coordinate as goal for the first action. The first action could either be a normal move or a special action (the latter available onl if the player has a specific god)
        Parameters:
        caller - The player from which the message comes from
        builderID - The builder from which the player has decided to execute the action
        coordinate - The coordinate chosen as the goal of the action
        specialPower - The parameter that specifies if the action is a regular one or a special one

      • selectCoordinate

        public void selectCoordinate​(RemoteView caller,
                             Coordinate coordinate,
                             boolean specialPower)
        This method is called when an action requires the selection of a coordinate to be executed. The model contains the logic responsible for detecting which action can be carried out by selecting a coordinate, depending on the current TurnState
        Parameters:
        caller - The player from which the message comes from
        coordinate - The coordinate chosen as the goal of the action
        specialPower - The parameter that specifies if the player has chosen to execute a special action

      • endPhase

        public void endPhase​(RemoteView caller)
        This method is called whenever the player has an additional optional action and decides not to carry it out
        Parameters:
        caller - The player from which the message comes from

      • handleStateError

        protected void handleStateError​(RemoteView remoteview)
        Description copied from class: StateMachineController
        This method is called whenever a method of the controller is called, but that method is not compatible with the current State
        Specified by:
        handleStateError in class StateMachineController
        Parameters:
        remoteview - The client caller
